sentences.en: " I must be the only Irishman who don't take the booze, " he said.
sentences.cn: “ 我想当唯一绝不酗酒的爱尔兰人, ” 他说.

sentences.en: " I seen too many good people get in trouble because of the booze. "
sentences.cn: “ 我亲眼看到过许多人由于酗酒而惹得一身麻烦. ”

sentences.en: Hardly less characteristic of our age is that repulsive booze - snobbery.
sentences.cn: 几乎与此同样反映了我们这个时代特征的是对狂饮的势利感.

sentences.en: He was dry for years but now he's back on the booze.
sentences.cn: 他已戒酒多年,但现在又开始喝了.

sentences.en: He's going to be a fantastic player if he keeps away from booze and women.
sentences.cn: 如果能不近酒色，他将成为一名出色的运动员。

sentences.en: I could smell booze on his breath.
sentences.cn: 我能从他的呼吸中闻到酒味.

sentences.en: Let's go out and booze up!
Peter has a special affinity for booze.
Slow down there, buddy. Take it easy on the booze.
sentences.cn: 老兄,喝慢点. 喝酒喝慢点.

sentences.en: Sonny said, " Easy, Mike, now is no time to get slowed up by booze. "
sentences.cn: 桑儿说: “ 忍一忍, 迈克, 目前不是用痛饮来消磨光阴的时候. ”

sentences.en: The party was a real booze - up.
sentences.cn: 这次聚会大家都开怀畅饮了.

sentences.en: There was free booze at the party.
Two of my closest friends tied the knot and there was plenty of booze.
sentences.cn: 我的两位好友结婚,备了很多酒.
我们可以在那儿玩地滚球戏,还可以痛痛快快地喝酒.

sentences.en: Yes, wine can be called booze, and so can rum and vodka.
sentences.cn: 噢, 这么说,booze可以指葡萄酒, 也可以指烈酒.
